title: Shadow Unleashed
description: Buoyed by their success in working independently, Shadow team are rocked by an enemy attack that threatens to destroy their reputation as well as their lives. They fight to clear their names and eradicate the threat of the Starbirth illegal drug.Their adventures take them from high society in London to South America. Lock discovers new information about his past, Jimmy finds out he has more ability than he can handle, Dave learns that telepathy is not always a good thing, Postie proves his integrity, Cheena battles to save herself and her place in the team, and Steven is frustrated as his plans are thwarted.Nobody is safe.Shadow Unleashed is the fourth and final book in the Starbirth series of fantasy adventures set in a contemporary basis.
author: J.M. Johnson
